mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_table (rv_number, us_id, pd_number, rv_content, rv_score) VALUES (sequence_rv_number.NEXTVAL, #{us_id}, #{pd_number}, #{rv_content}, #{rv_score})
mapper.select: SELECT rv_number, us_id, pd_number, rv_content, rv_score, rv_register_date FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(review_table pk_rv_number) */ ROWNUM rn, rv_number, us_id, pd_number, rv_content, rv_score, rv_register_date FROM review_table WHERE pd_number = #{pd_number} AND ROWNUM <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_table WHERE pd_number = #{pd_number}
